Befuddling Bypass.name: Befuddling Bypass
Befuddling Bypass.fullText:
Kundarak Ghorad'din Attack 11Befuddling Bypass

Empowered by your dragon mark, your shot befuddles your foe, allowing you to pass by it before the creature realizes you are gone.

Encounter        Charm, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength or Dexterity vs. Reflex

Hit: 2[W] + Strength or Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. You can then move your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from the target.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 71.
Befuddling Bypass.flavor: Empowered by your dragon mark, your shot befuddles your foe, allowing you to pass by it before the creature realizes you are gone.
Befuddling Bypass.onHit: 2[W] + Strength or Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. You can then move your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from the target.

Thwart the Walls.name: Thwart the Walls
Thwart the Walls.fullText:
Kundarak Ghorad'din Utility 12Thwart the Walls

You start to fade out of existence, gaining the ability to step through walls and obstacles.

Encounter  
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You gain insubstantial and phasing until the end of your next turn.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 71.
Thwart the Walls.flavor: You start to fade out of existence, gaining the ability to step through walls and obstacles.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You gain insubstantial and phasing until the end of your next turn.
Thwart the Walls.effect: You gain insubstantial and phasing until the end of your next turn.

Ward Unleashed.name: Ward Unleashed
Ward Unleashed.fullText:
Kundarak Ghorad'din Attack 20Ward Unleashed

With the power of your dragon mark, you dispel nearby wards and use their power to impede your enemies.

Daily  
Standard Action      Area burst 2 within 10 squares

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength or Dexterity + 4 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength or Dexterity + 6 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 3d10 + Strength or Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Any enemy zones or conjurations in the burst end.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 71.
Ward Unleashed.flavor: With the power of your dragon mark, you dispel nearby wards and use their power to impede your enemies.

Attack: Strength or Dexterity + 4 vs. Fortitude
